title: January Jones keeps cool with sunhat and ice cream on bonding day with son at pumpkin patch in LA
text:
Weather was in the 80s in Los Angeles.

So it comes as no wonder January Jones did her best to keep cool.

The 41-year-old actress donned a sunhat while enjoying an ice cream cone during a bonding outing with eight-year-old son Xander and a gal pal at a pumpkin patch on Monday.

Good times: January Jomes enjoyed bonding outing with eight-year-old son Xander and a gal pal at a pumpkin patch in Moorpark, California on Monday

Chill: The 41-year-old actress kept cool as she donned a sunhat while enjoying an ice cream cone in the 80-degree weather

The Mad Men actress certainly seemed to be having a blast on the outing with her only child as she had a big smile on her face while indulging in the snacks at the outdoor event in Moorpark, California.

In addition to ice cream, January also munched on a corn on the cob and hot dogs.

She kept her look casual in a plain white T-shirt with baggy boyfriend jeans and white sneakers.

Yum: She also indulged in some corn on the cob

Snack time: She kept her look casual in a plain white T-shirt with baggy boyfriend jeans and white sneakers as she grabbed some hot dogs

Aside from the sunhat, she accessorized with a small designer bag featuring a gold chain which matched her two necklaces with small pendants.

Her blonde locks were worn down under her hat as it was tucked behind her ear to show off her natural beauty as the star had minimal make-up on her face.

For personal reasons, the actress has never publicly revealed Xander's paternity, becoming a single mom at the age of 33.

She told Red in 2017 that 'my younger sisters and my mom and my doula were in the room; my brother-in-law and my dad were next door,' she said of the birth.

Stylish: Aside from the sunhat, she accessorized with a small designer bag featuring a gold chain which matched her two necklaces with small pendants as she flashed a big smile

'I only wanted women with me. Female energy. It was a 30-hour process but it was awesome. I'd love to do it again.'

January can now be seen on The Politician which recently began streaming on Netflix.

The series was crated by Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk and Ian Brennan and follows the exploits of high school student Payton Hobart (Broadway star Ben Platt) who dreams of one day becoming president.

In order to aid his rise to power, he decides to start by running for class president.

New gig: January can now be seen on The Politician which recently began streaming on Netflix as she is pictured at the premiere in New York last month

Every season of the series, which also stars Zoey Deutch, Lucy Boynton, Gwyneth Paltrow and Jessica Lange, will chart a different election in Payton's life.

January is featured in a recurring role in the series along with Dylan McDermott, who plays her character's husband.

The Politician is now available to stream on Netflix.
